title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, July 31, 2020
description: It's the birthday of poet and novelist Kim Addonizio (1954), who said, "Poetry is not a means to an end, but a continuing engagement with being alive."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of poet and novelist Kim Addonizio (1954), who said, "Poetry is not a means to an end, but a continuing engagement with being alive."
